entities.name: ignotus peverell
entities.description: The third brother of the Peverell brothers who died. Mentioned as Ignotus's last living descendant was born in Godric's Hollow.

entities.name: godric's hollow
entities.description: A village where Ignotus Peverell and his descendants were born.

relationships.description: Ignotus Peverell was born in Godric's Hollow, and his descendants were also born there.
